name: Solimar International
tagline: Washington Tourism Development and Marketing Firm
description:
Solimar International is a small sustainable tourism and marketing firm with a team of creative professionals who share a common vision of how sustainable tourism can stimulate economic growth while conserving natural resources and cultural heritage.
We deliver innovative tourism development, media, and marketing strategies for our clients, which include international development organizations, regional tourism authorities, national and local governments, tourism enterprises and local communities.
